Articles.Content:
<p><img src="http://media.tumblr.com/f877983c4f5dc185bb3b4a0e8611b711/tumblr_inline_mx7rrs3VM91rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p>**** <iframe frameborder="0" height="315" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/UjyuqiU9xC8" width="420"></iframe></p>

<p><strong>blizzy78’</strong>s <a href="http://bit.ly/1eRjBcq"><strong>Achievements</strong></a> plugin is an ingenious way to get more out of your <em><strong>KSP</strong></em> experience without changing much about it. It’s a fairly straightforward plugin that is constantly updated with user-submitted achievement ideas, includes comparability with other mods and currently features a whopping 132 achievements. If you’re the type who enjoys victory sounds and the simple act of being acknowledged for your in-game accomplishments, the <a href="http://bit.ly/1eRjBcq"><strong>Achievements</strong></a> plugin is for you.</p>
I like it, but don't want to do EVERYTHNIG all over again just to earn it

I like it, but don't want to do EVERYTHNIG all over again just to earn it

Looking at your sig, doing just that would be a monumental achievement in itself .

I feel like the active memory reduction mod is more significant and deserving but this mod looks fun too.

can't please everyone

Love this mod Definitely adds some depth to the game. thanks for it blizzy!!!

nice tiny mod. fills the waiting time for .23 with new targets, if the tech tree is allready done.

good work.

Too many achievements at once...if this will be ever built into real game,it would need less achievements at once,and not achievements you NEED to get,but achievements you get randomly,just by flying there and landing here... Also,change sound to applause.Great anyway!
You don't need to get any achievements - it's completely optional.
